DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to develop an evaluative questionnaire, to evaluate patients with hip and groin disability, and a strength measurement for the hip, for patients with hip and groin disability. Both measurement instrument are aimed for evaluating the natural course and different treatment modalities in patients with hip and groin disability.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Outcome-measures for Physically Active Patients With Hip and Groin Pain
DOC.criteria: Hip and/groin pain more than 6 weeks Physically active Systemic diseases Physically inactive
DOC.keyword: To develop two new outcome measures for patients with hip and groin disability
